resources.string: When you click on the "Import (JSON)" button, you will be able to choose the (.json) entry file from your phone directory. When you select the (.json) file, it will overwrite the application\'s current entry file with the one you are importing.

When you click the "Export (JSON)" button, your (.json) file containing all your entries will be dropped in your downloads directory. With this file, you can import it onto a new phone or use it as a backup of all your work hour entries.
When you click the "Export (CSV)" button, your (.csv) file containing all your entries will be dropped in your downloads directory. With this file, you can look at your at your entries in excel.
